articles.description: The singer announced the joyous news on Instagram on Friday and referred to her unborn child as a 'miracle'.
articles.content: Atomic Kitten star Natasha Hamilton has announced she is pregnant with her fifth child. The singer announced the joyous news on Instagram on Friday (February 17) and referred to her unborn child as a… [+2188 chars]

articles.title: Lithuania is ready for its 'Pabandom Iš Naujo!' final - Eurovision.tv
articles.description: On Saturday 18 February, Lithuania will select its entry to the 67th Eurovision Song Contest, via the 'Pabandom Iš Naujo!' final.
articles.content:
